data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 83 believers in Aragatsotn, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Aragatsotn, Armenia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Aragatsotn a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 10 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Aragatsotn. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Aragatsotn, Armenia.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Byurakan
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Byurakan, Aragatsotn, Armenia.
Father, guide the church in Aragatsotn, Armenia to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Lord, the the state of Aragatsotn will disappear one day, but your Word will never disappear. Call all who claim Christianity to anchor their lives on your Word.
data.verse: Heaven and earth will disappear, but my words will never disappear.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Aragatsotn, Armenia to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.
